Name: Jayne Mansfield
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Flute glass .
Prepare garnish of strawberry with a mint sprig tip replacing the strawberry's leaves.
MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker.
Add next 3 ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
TOP with sparkling wine and briefly stir. (Or pour half the sparling wine into the glass first to help reduce foaming and eliminate need to stir.)
Review: Fizz is made to accompany strawberries, all the more delicious when laced with rum.
History: Named after the Hollywood actress, nightclub entertainer and 1950s-60s sex symbol. Born Vera Jayne Palmer in April 1933, Jayne Mansfield's fame and notoriety were helped by her numerous publicity stunts and flamboyant personal life. Nicknamed "Hollywood's smartest dumb blonde," she enjoyed several box-office successes, won a Golden Globe Award, and, in the sex comedy Promises! Promises! (1963) became the first American actress to perform a nude scene in a major movie. Tragically, she died aged just 34 (on 29 June 1967) in a car crash in New Orleans.
